summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Bedolaga Go installer - all core functionality verified successfully
passed_tests: Go code compiles successfully for linux/amd64
Go code compiles successfully for linux/arm64
Pre-compiled binaries exist and are executable
Binary displays banner with correct version (1.0.0)
Menu shows 3 options: Install, Update, Uninstall
generateToken function produces valid hex tokens of correct length (8, 16, 32 bytes)
buildEnvFile function generates .env with all required parameters
Generated .env includes all critical Bedolaga bot parameters (BOT_TOKEN, ADMIN_IDS, REMNAWAVE_API_URL, etc.)
Build script (build.sh) is functional and builds for different architectures
Binary interactive menus work correctly for all 3 options
